tool_description:
Get instant access to sports, spreads, odds, and more. 

Leagues include:  nba, nfl, nhl, ncaab, ncaaf, ufc, wnba, cfl, la-liga, epl, euro, bundesliga, bra-serie-a, bra-serie-b, league-1, champions-league, liga-mx, mls, ita-serie-a, copa-america, efl-championship, fa-cup, boxing.
name: Sports Betting Odds
title: Sports Betting Odds

api_list.name: Upcoming Events (by League)
api_list.description: Get all upcoming events for a specific league.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com/nba"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com/{league}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Events  (by League & Date)
api_list.description: Get games/events for a specific league for a specific date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com/nba/12-17-2023"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com/{league}/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
